local_intent: Execute the straight pull along the drawer opening axis after confirming the handle is grasped and aligned, then verify the drawer is open.
assumptions: Handle is already grasped; robot is positioned to pull without collision.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT by verifying visibility, confirming grasp and yaw=90 alignment, then performing MoveDelta(y, 0.2, 1500) and checking ContainerOpen(drawer).
